grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 斗【ト】to, traditional unit of volume, approx. 18 litres, square bearing block (at the top of a pillar), Chinese "Dipper" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
斗【トマス】kanji radical 68 at right
泰斗【タイト】great authority, eminent person, luminary
擬斗【ギトウ】fight scene, stage combat, staged sword fight
